channel.title: Worthless notes of another software engineer on peyman.blog
channel.description: Recent content in Worthless notes of another software engineer on peyman.blog

item.title: About
item.description: Me My name is Peyman Salehi. I’m a software engineer. Most of my experiences are in back-end development. Besides that, I’m very enthusiastic about system engineering and spend my free time researching and learn more about it. In my blog, I mostly write about what I learn or experience in my job and usually relates to software engineering, programming languages, Linux, open-source software and, tools I use. And finally, I’m working in tech to make things easier for ourselves, not doing weird stuff!
